chat_history.message: Hi there! How are you doing?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you. How can I assist you today?
I have a question about your products.
Sure, go ahead and ask your question. I'm here to help.
What are the different payment options available?
We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers as payment options. You can choose the one that suits you best.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
